00001 //*****************************************************************************
00002 //
00003 // Filename : Container.c
00004 //
00005 // Purpose : Function definition for the Container
00006 //
00007 // Modification History : 
00008 // 25 nov 96 TS creation
00009 //
00010 // 19 Dec 97 AM Replace all memcpy() with memmove(), since overlap possibilities
00011 //                                        abound (and there were already bugs in do_copy() for ordered lists)
00012 //                                        While the memcpy() was working in _DEBUG mode, it was failing
00013 //                                        reproducibly in RELEASE mode whenever regions overlapped!
00014 //                                        Having read the code, I strongly suggest that you DO NOT use this
00015 //                                        stuff at all and write your own instead.  Tarun was no Carmack...
00016 //                                                                                                                                                    - Alex Meduna
00017 // 1998     KM Detached all references to this file from JA2 as it caused a lot of hard to debug
00018 //         crashes.  The VOBJECT/VSURFACE lists are now self-maintained and no longer use the
00019 //                       this crap.  DON'T USE THIS -- NO MATTER WHAT!!!

00046 typedef struct StackHeaderTag
00047 {
00048       UINT32 uiTotal_items;
00049       UINT32 uiSiz_of_elem;
00050       UINT32 uiMax_size;
00051 
00052 } StackHeader;
00053 
00054 typedef struct HeaderTag
00055 {
00056       UINT32 uiTotal_items;
00057       UINT32 uiSiz_of_elem;
00058       UINT32 uiMax_size;
00059       UINT32 uiHead;
00060       UINT32 uiTail;
00061 
00062 } QueueHeader , ListHeader;

00084 //*****************************************************************************
00085 //
00086 // CreateStack
00087 //
00088 // Parameter List : num_items - estimated number 
00089 //                                                    of items in stack
00090 //                                                    siz_each - size of each item
00091 // Return Value   NULL if unsuccesful
00092 //                                         pointer to allocated memory
00093 // Modification History :
00094 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00095 //
00096 //*****************************************************************************
00097 
00098 HSTACK CreateStack(UINT32 uiNum_items, UINT32 uiSiz_each)
00099 {
00100       UINT32 uiAmount;
00101       HSTACK hStack;
00102       StackHeader *pStack;
00103 
00104       // assign an initial amount of memory to allocate
00105       if ((uiNum_items > 0) && (uiSiz_each > 0))
00106             uiAmount = uiNum_items * uiSiz_each;
00107       else
00108       {
00109             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Requested stack items and size have to be >0");
00110                   return NULL;
00111       }     
00112             // allocate the container memory
00113       if ((hStack = MemAlloc(uiAmount + sizeof(StackHeader))) == 0)
00114       {
00115                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not allocate stack container memory");
00116             return NULL;
00117             }
00118             pStack = (StackHeader *)hStack;
00119       //initialize the header variables
00120             pStack->uiMax_size = uiAmount + sizeof(StackHeader);
00121       pStack->uiTotal_items = 0;
00122       pStack->uiSiz_of_elem = uiSiz_each;
00123             
00124       // return the pointer to the memory
00125       
00126       return hStack;
00127 }
00128 
00129 //*****************************************************************************
00130 //
00131 // CreateQueue
00132 //
00133 // Parameter List : num_items - estimated number 
00134 //                                                    of items in queue
00135 //                                                    siz_each - size of each item
00136 // Return Value   NULL if unsuccesful
00137 //                                         pointer to allocated memory
00138 // Modification History :
00139 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00140 //
00141 //*****************************************************************************
00142 HQUEUE CreateQueue(UINT32 uiNum_items, UINT32 uiSiz_each)
00143 {
00144       UINT32 uiAmount;
00145       HQUEUE hQueue;
00146       QueueHeader *pQueue;
00147 
00148       // check to see if the queue has more than 1
00149       // element to be created and that the size > 1
00150 
00151       if ((uiNum_items > 0) && (uiSiz_each > 0))
00152             uiAmount = uiNum_items * uiSiz_each;
00153       else
00154       {
00155             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Requested queue items and size have to be >0");
00156                   return NULL;
00157       }     
00158 
00159             // allocate the queue memory
00160       if ((hQueue = MemAlloc(uiAmount + sizeof(QueueHeader))) == 0)
00161       {
00162                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not allocate queue container memory");
00163             return NULL;
00164             }
00165       
00166       pQueue = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
00167       //initialize the queue structure
00168 
00169             pQueue->uiMax_size = uiAmount + sizeof(QueueHeader);
00170       pQueue->uiTotal_items = 0;
00171       pQueue->uiSiz_of_elem = uiSiz_each;
00172       pQueue->uiTail = pQueue->uiHead = sizeof(QueueHeader);
00173 
00174       // return the pointer to memory     
00175       return hQueue;
00176 }

00283 //*****************************************************************************
00284 //
00285 // push
00286 //
00287 // Parameter List : void * - pointer to stack 
00288 //                                                    container 
00289 //                                                    data - data to add to stack
00290 //                                               
00291 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if push ok
00292 //                                         else false
00293 //                                         
00294 // Modification History :
00295 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00296 //
00297 //*****************************************************************************
00298 HSTACK Push(HSTACK hStack, void *pdata)
00299 {
00300       StackHeader *pTemp_cont;
00301       UINT32 uiOffset;
00302       UINT32 uiNew_size;
00303       void *pvoid;
00304       BYTE *pbyte;
00305 
00306       // check for a NULL pointer
00307 
00308       if (hStack == NULL)
00309       {
00310             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the stack");
00311             return NULL;
00312       }
00313 
00314       // some valid data should be passed in
00315       if (pdata == NULL)
00316       {
00317             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto stack is NULL");
00318             return NULL;
00319       }
00320 
00321       //perform operations to calculate offset and decide if the container has to resized
00322       pTemp_cont = (StackHeader *)hStack;
00323       uiOffset = (pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem * pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items) + sizeof(StackHeader);
00324       
00325       if ((uiOffset + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem) > pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00326       {
00327       uiNew_size = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size + (pTemp_cont->uiMax_size - sizeof(StackHeader));
00328       pTemp_cont->uiMax_size = uiNew_size;
00329             if ((hStack = MemRealloc(hStack, uiNew_size)) == NULL)
00330             {
00331                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not resize stack container memory");
00332                   return NULL; 
00333                   }     
00334             pTemp_cont = (StackHeader *)hStack;
00335       }     
00336       pbyte = (BYTE *)hStack;
00337       pbyte += uiOffset; 
00338       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00339       //copy data from pdata to pvoid - the stack
00340       memmove(pvoid, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00341             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items++;
00342       //return push succeeded
00343       return hStack;
00344 }
00345 //*****************************************************************************
00346 //
00347 // pop
00348 //
00349 // Parameter List : void * - pointer to stack 
00350 //                                                    container 
00351 //                                                    
00352 //                                               
00353 // Return Value : void * - pointer to stack 
00354 //                                              after pushing element 
00355 //
00356 // Modification History :
00357 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00358 //
00359 //*****************************************************************************
00360 BOOLEAN Pop(HSTACK hStack, void *pdata)
00361 {
00362       StackHeader *pTemp_cont;
00363       UINT32 uiOffset;
00364       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
00365       UINT32 uiTotal;
00366       void *pvoid;
00367       BYTE *pbyte;
00368 
00369       // check for a NULL queue
00370 
00371       if (hStack == NULL)
00372       {
00373             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the stack");
00374             return FALSE;
00375       }
00376       if (pdata == NULL)
00377       {
00378             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Variable where data is to be stored is NULL");
00379             return FALSE;
00380       }     
00381       pTemp_cont = (StackHeader *)hStack;
00382             uiTotal = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
00383             uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
00384       if (uiTotal == 0)
00385       {
00386                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is no data in stack to pop");
00387             return FALSE;
00388       }
00389 
00390       // calculate offsets to decide if the page should be rezied
00391       uiOffset = (uiSize_of_each * uiTotal) + sizeof(StackHeader);
00392       uiOffset -= uiSize_of_each;
00393       pbyte = (BYTE *)hStack;
00394       pbyte += uiOffset; 
00395       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00396       // get the data from pvoid and store in pdata
00397       memmove(pdata, pvoid, uiSize_of_each);
00398             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;
00399       return TRUE;
00400 }
00401 //*****************************************************************************
00402 //
00403 // PeekStack
00404 //
00405 // Parameter List : void * - buffer to hold data
00406 //                                                    
00407 //                                               
00408 // Return Value : TRUE if stack not empty
00409 //
00410 // Modification History :
00411 // Apr 14 2000 SCT -> Created
00412 //
00413 //*****************************************************************************
00414 BOOLEAN PeekStack(HSTACK hStack, void *pdata)
00415 {
00416       StackHeader *pTemp_cont;
00417       UINT32 uiOffset;
00418       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
00419       UINT32 uiTotal;
00420       void *pvoid;
00421       BYTE *pbyte;
00422 
00423       // check for a NULL queue
00424 
00425       if (hStack == NULL)
00426       {
00427             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the stack");
00428             return FALSE;
00429       }
00430       if (pdata == NULL)
00431       {
00432             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Variable where data is to be stored is NULL");
00433             return FALSE;
00434       }     
00435       pTemp_cont = (StackHeader *)hStack;
00436             uiTotal = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
00437             uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
00438       if (uiTotal == 0)
00439       {
00440                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is no data in stack to pop");
00441             return FALSE;
00442       }
00443 
00444       // calculate offsets to decide if the page should be rezied
00445       uiOffset = (uiSize_of_each * uiTotal) + sizeof(StackHeader);
00446       uiOffset -= uiSize_of_each;
00447       pbyte = (BYTE *)hStack;
00448       pbyte += uiOffset; 
00449       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00450       // get the data from pvoid and store in pdata
00451       memmove(pdata, pvoid, uiSize_of_each);
00452       return TRUE;
00453 }

00460 // Return Value   : BOOLEAN

00463 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00464 //

00466 BOOLEAN DeleteStack(HSTACK hStack)
00467 {
00468       if (hStack == NULL)
00469       {
00470             DbgMessage(TOPIC_STACK_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the stack");
00471             return FALSE;
00472       }
00473       // free the memory assigned to the handle
00474       MemFree(hStack);
00475       return TRUE;
00476 }

00560 {

00588 //*****************************************************************************
00589 //
00590 // PeekQueue - gets the first item in queue without
00591 // actually deleting it.
00592 //
00593 // Parameter List : pvoid_queue - pointer to queue 
00594 //                                                    container 
00595 //                                                    data - data removed from queue
00596 //                                               
00597 // Return Value   pointer to queue with data removed 
00598 //                                         or NULL if failed
00599 //                                         
00600 // Modification History :
00601 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00602 //
00603 //*****************************************************************************
00604 BOOLEAN PeekQueue(HQUEUE hQueue, void *pdata)
00605 {
00606       QueueHeader *pTemp_cont;
00607       void *pvoid;
00608       BYTE *pbyte;
00609       
00610       // cannot check for invalid handle , only 0
00611       if (hQueue == NULL)
00612       {
00613             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the queue");
00614             return FALSE;
00615       }
00616       if (pdata == NULL)
00617       {
00618             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Memory fo Data to be removed from queue is NULL");
00619             return FALSE;
00620       }
00621             
00622       //assign to temporary variables
00623       pTemp_cont = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
00624             
00625       // if theres no elements to remove return error
00626       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00627       {
00628             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is nothing in the queue");
00629             return FALSE;
00630       }
00631 
00632       //copy the element pointed to by uiHead
00633       
00634       pbyte = (BYTE *)hQueue;
00635       pbyte += pTemp_cont->uiHead; 
00636       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00637       memmove(pdata, pvoid, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00638       
00639       return TRUE;
00640 }
00641 //*****************************************************************************
00642 //
00643 // PeekList - gets the specified item in the list without
00644 // actually deleting it.
00645 //
00646 // Parameter List : hList - pointer to list 
00647 //                                                    container 
00648 //                                                    data - data where list element is stored
00649 //                                               
00650 // Return Value   BOOLEAN
00651 //                                         
00652 //                                         
00653 // Modification History :
00654 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00655 //
00656 //*****************************************************************************
00657 BOOLEAN PeekList(HLIST hList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
00658 {
00659       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
00660       void *pvoid;
00661       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
00662       BYTE *pbyte;
00663       
00664       // cannot check for invalid handle , only 0
00665       if (hList == NULL)
00666       {
00667             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the list");
00668             return FALSE;
00669       }
00670       if (pdata == NULL)
00671       {
00672             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Memory fo Data to be removed from list is NULL");
00673             return FALSE;
00674       }
00675             
00676       //assign to temporary variables
00677       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
00678             
00679       // if theres no elements to peek return error
00680       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00681       {
00682             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is nothing in the list");
00683             return FALSE;
00684       }
00685       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
00686       {
00687             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is no item at this position");
00688             return FALSE;
00689       }
00690 
00691       //copy the element pointed to by uiHead
00692       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00693       if (uiOffsetSrc >= pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00694             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - pTemp_cont->uiMax_size);
00695 
00696       pbyte = (BYTE *)hList;
00697       pbyte += uiOffsetSrc; 
00698       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00699       memmove(pdata, pvoid, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00700       
00701       return TRUE;
00702 }

00705 //*****************************************************************************
00706 //
00707 // SwapListNode - Swaps the contents of a list node with the given parameter.
00708 //                                              Note: The data being swapped in MUST have the same size as
00709 //                                              the current node size or strange things could happen.
00710 //                                              Contents of node and pdata parameter are swapped.
00711 //
00712 // Parameter List : hList - pointer to list container 
00713 //                                                    pdata - pointer to data to be swapped
00714 //                                                    uiPos - List position with which to swap.
00715 //                                               
00716 // Return Value   BOOLEAN - TRUE if successful, FALSE if function fails.
00717 //                                         
00718 //                                         
00719 // Modification History :
00720 //    Added to SGP by Bret Rowdon for use with JA2. May 1 '97.
00721 //          - This function was based on the PeekList function.
00722 //
00723 //*****************************************************************************
00724 BOOLEAN SwapListNode(HLIST hList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
00725 {
00726       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
00727       BYTE *pvoid;
00728       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
00729       BYTE *pbyte;
00730       BYTE *pSrc;
00731 
00732       
00733       // cannot check for invalid handle, only 0
00734       if (hList == NULL)
00735       {
00736             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid pointer to list");
00737             return FALSE;
00738       }
00739 
00740       if (pdata == NULL)
00741       {
00742             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data pointer to be swapped from list is NULL");
00743             return FALSE;
00744       }
00745             
00746       //assign to temporary variables
00747       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
00748             
00749       // if theres no elements to peek return error
00750       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00751       {
00752             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Empty list");
00753             return FALSE;
00754       }
00755 
00756       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
00757       {
00758             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid list position");
00759             return FALSE;
00760       }
00761 
00762       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00763       if (uiOffsetSrc >= pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00764             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - pTemp_cont->uiMax_size);
00765 
00766       pbyte = (BYTE *)hList;
00767       pbyte += uiOffsetSrc; 
00768       pvoid = pbyte;
00769       pSrc = (BYTE *) pdata;
00770 
00771       // possible overlap, use memmove()
00772       memmove(pvoid, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00773       //memmove(pvoid, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00774 
00775       return TRUE;
00776 }
00777 
00778 
00779 
00780 //*****************************************************************************
00781 //
00782 // StoreListNode - Stores the contents of a list node with the given parameter.
00783 //                                                    Unlike SwapListNode(), this does NOT swap previous contents
00784 //                                                    back into the pdata buffer!
00785 //
00786 // Parameter List : hList - pointer to list container 
00787 //                                                    pdata - pointer to data to be stored
00788 //                                                    uiPos - List position into which to store.
00789 //                                               
00790 // Return Value   BOOLEAN - TRUE if successful, FALSE if function fails.
00791 //                                         
00792 //                                         
00793 // Modification History :
00794 //    Added to SGP by Alex Meduna for use with Wiz8. Oct 31 '97.
00795 //          - This function is nearly identical to the SwapListNode() function.
00796 //
00797 //*****************************************************************************
00798 BOOLEAN StoreListNode(HLIST hList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
00799 {
00800       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
00801       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
00802       BYTE *pbyte;
00803       
00804       // cannot check for invalid handle , only 0
00805       if (hList == NULL)
00806       {
00807             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid pointer to list");
00808             return FALSE;
00809       }
00810 
00811       if (pdata == NULL)
00812       {
00813             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data pointer to be swapped from list is NULL");
00814             return FALSE;
00815       }
00816             
00817       //assign to temporary variables
00818       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
00819             
00820       // if theres no elements to peek return error
00821       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00822       {
00823             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Empty list");
00824             return FALSE;
00825       }
00826 
00827       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
00828       {
00829             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid list position");
00830             return FALSE;
00831       }
00832 
00833       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00834       if (uiOffsetSrc >= pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00835             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - pTemp_cont->uiMax_size);
00836 
00837       pbyte = (BYTE *)hList;
00838       pbyte += uiOffsetSrc;
00839 
00840       memmove(pbyte, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00841 
00842       return TRUE;
00843 }
00844

00846 
00847 //*****************************************************************************
00848 //
00849 // PeekOrdList - gets the specified item in the list without
00850 // actually deleting it.
00851 //
00852 // Parameter List : hList - pointer to ordered list 
00853 //                                                    container 
00854 //                                                    data - data where list element is stored
00855 //                                               
00856 // Return Value   BOOLEAN
00857 //                                         
00858 //                                         
00859 // Modification History :
00860 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00861 //
00862 //*****************************************************************************
00863 BOOLEAN PeekOrdList(HORDLIST hOrdList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
00864 {
00865       OrdListHeader *pTemp_cont;
00866       void *pvoid;
00867       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
00868       BYTE *pbyte;
00869       
00870       // cannot check for invalid handle , only 0
00871       if (hOrdList == NULL)
00872       {
00873             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the ordered list");
00874             return FALSE;
00875       }
00876       if (pdata == NULL)
00877       {
00878             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Memory fo Data to be removed from ordered list is NULL");
00879             return FALSE;
00880       }
00881             
00882       //assign to temporary variables
00883       pTemp_cont = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
00884             
00885       // if theres no elements to peek return error
00886       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00887       {
00888             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is nothing in the list");
00889             return FALSE;
00890       }
00891       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
00892       {
00893             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is no item at this position");
00894             return FALSE;
00895       }
00896 
00897       //copy the element pointed to by uiHead
00898       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00899       if (uiOffsetSrc >= pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00900             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - pTemp_cont->uiMax_size);
00901 
00902       pbyte = (BYTE *)hOrdList;
00903       pbyte += uiOffsetSrc; 
00904       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00905       memmove(pdata, pvoid, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00906       
00907       return TRUE;
00908 }
00909 //*****************************************************************************
00910 //
00911 // RemfromQueue
00912 //
00913 // Parameter List : pvoid_queue - pointer to queue 
00914 //                                                    container 
00915 //                                                    data - data removed from queue
00916 //                                               
00917 // Return Value   pointer to queue with data removed 
00918 //                                         or NULL if failed
00919 //                                         
00920 // Modification History :
00921 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00922 //
00923 //*****************************************************************************
00924 BOOLEAN RemfromQueue(HQUEUE hQueue, void *pdata)
00925 {
00926       QueueHeader *pTemp_cont;
00927       void *pvoid;
00928       BYTE *pbyte;
00929       
00930       // cannot check for invalid handle , only 0
00931       if (hQueue == NULL)
00932       {
00933             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the queue");
00934             return FALSE;
00935       }
00936       if (pdata == NULL)
00937       {
00938             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Memory fo Data to be removed from queue is NULL");
00939             return FALSE;
00940       }
00941             
00942       //assign to temporary variables
00943       pTemp_cont = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
00944             
00945       // if theres no elements to remove return error
00946       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
00947       {
00948             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There is nothing in the queue to remove");
00949             return FALSE;
00950       }
00951 
00952       //remove the element pointed to by uiHead
00953       
00954       pbyte = (BYTE *)hQueue;
00955       pbyte += pTemp_cont->uiHead; 
00956       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
00957       memmove(pdata, pvoid, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
00958             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;
00959       pTemp_cont->uiHead += pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
00960       
00961       // if after removing an element head = tail then set them both
00962       // to the beginning of the container as it is empty
00963 
00964       if (pTemp_cont->uiHead == pTemp_cont->uiTail)
00965             pTemp_cont->uiHead = pTemp_cont->uiTail = sizeof(QueueHeader);
00966       
00967       // if only the head is at the end of the container then make it point 
00968       // to the beginning of the container
00969 
00970       if (pTemp_cont->uiHead == pTemp_cont->uiMax_size)
00971             pTemp_cont->uiHead = sizeof(QueueHeader);
00972 
00973       return TRUE;
00974 }
00975 
00976 //*****************************************************************************
00977 //
00978 // AddtoQueue
00979 //
00980 // Parameter List : pvoid_queue - pointer to queue 
00981 //                                                    container 
00982 //                                                    pdata - pointer to data to add to queue
00983 //                                               
00984 // Return Value   pointer to queue with data added
00985 //                                         else false
00986 //                                         
00987 // Modification History :
00988 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
00989 //
00990 //*****************************************************************************
00991 HQUEUE AddtoQueue(HQUEUE hQueue, void *pdata)
00992 {
00993       QueueHeader *pTemp_cont;
00994       UINT32 uiMax_size;
00995       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
00996       UINT32 uiTotal;
00997       UINT32 uiNew_size;
00998       UINT32 uiHead;
00999       UINT32 uiTail;
01000       void *pvoid;
01001       BYTE *pbyte;
01002       BYTE *pmaxsize;
01003       BYTE *presize;
01004       BOOLEAN fresize;
01005 
01006       // check for invalid handle = 0
01007       if (hQueue == NULL)
01008       {
01009             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid pointer to the queue");
01010             return NULL;
01011       }
01012 
01013       // check for data = NULL
01014       if (pdata == NULL)
01015       {
01016             DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be added onto queue is NULL");
01017             return NULL;
01018       }
01019 
01020       // assign some temporary variables
01021       fresize = FALSE;
01022       pTemp_cont = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
01023             uiTotal = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01024             uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01025       uiMax_size = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size;
01026       uiHead = pTemp_cont->uiHead;
01027       uiTail = pTemp_cont->uiTail;
01028       if ((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) > uiMax_size)
01029       {
01030             uiTail = pTemp_cont->uiTail = sizeof(QueueHeader);
01031             fresize = TRUE;
01032       }
01033       if ((uiHead == uiTail) && ((uiHead >= (sizeof(QueueHeader) + uiSize_of_each)) || (fresize == TRUE)))
01034       {
01035             uiNew_size = uiMax_size + (uiMax_size - sizeof(QueueHeader));
01036             pTemp_cont->uiMax_size = uiNew_size;
01037             if ((hQueue = MemRealloc(hQueue, uiNew_size)) == NULL)
01038             {
01039              DbgMessage(TOPIC_QUEUE_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not resize queue container memory");
01040                    return NULL; 
01041             }
01042             // copy memory from beginning of container to end of container
01043       // so that all the data is in one continuous block
01044       
01045             pTemp_cont = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
01046             presize = (BYTE *)hQueue;
01047             pmaxsize = (BYTE *)hQueue;
01048             presize += sizeof(QueueHeader);
01049             pmaxsize += uiMax_size;
01050             if (uiHead > sizeof(QueueHeader))
01051                   memmove(pmaxsize, presize, uiHead-sizeof(QueueHeader));
01052             pTemp_cont->uiTail = uiMax_size + (uiHead-sizeof(QueueHeader));
01053       }     
01054       pbyte = (BYTE *)hQueue;
01055       pbyte += pTemp_cont->uiTail; 
01056       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
01057       memmove(pvoid, pdata, uiSize_of_each);
01058             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items++;
01059       pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each; 
01060       return hQueue;
01061 }
01062 
01063 //*****************************************************************************
01064 //
01065 // do_copy
01066 //
01067 // Parameter List : pointer to mem, source offset, dest offset, size 
01068 //                                                           
01069 // Return Value   BOOLEAN
01070 //                                         
01071 //                                         
01072 // Modification History :
01073 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01074 //
01075 //*****************************************************************************
01076 BOOLEAN do_copy(void *pmem_void, UINT32 uiSourceOfst, UINT32 uiDestOfst, UINT32 uiSize)
01077 {
01078       BYTE *pOffsetSrc;
01079       BYTE *pOffsetDst;
01080       void *pvoid_src;
01081       void *pvoid_dest;
01082 
01083       if ((uiSourceOfst < 0) || (uiDestOfst < 0) || (uiSize < 0))
01084       {
01085             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid parameters passed to do_copy");
01086             return FALSE;
01087       }
01088 
01089             if (pmem_void == NULL)
01090       {
01091             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid pointer passed to do_copy");
01092             return FALSE;
01093       }
01094             pOffsetSrc = (BYTE *)pmem_void;
01095       pOffsetSrc += uiSourceOfst;
01096       pOffsetDst = (BYTE *)pmem_void;
01097       pOffsetDst += uiDestOfst;
01098       pvoid_src = (void *)pOffsetSrc;
01099       pvoid_dest = (void *)pOffsetDst;
01100       memmove(pvoid_dest, pvoid_src, uiSize);
01101       return TRUE;
01102 }
01103 //*****************************************************************************
01104 //
01105 // do_copy_data
01106 //
01107 // Parameter List : pointer to mem, pointer to data, source offset, size 
01108 //                                                           
01109 // Return Value   BOOLEAN
01110 //                                         
01111 //                                         
01112 // Modification History :
01113 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01114 //
01115 //*****************************************************************************
01116 BOOLEAN do_copy_data(void *pmem_void, void *data, UINT32 uiSrcOfst, UINT32 uiSize)
01117 {
01118       BYTE *pOffsetSrc;
01119       void *pvoid_src;
01120 
01121       if ((uiSrcOfst < 0) || (uiSize < 0))
01122       {
01123             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid parameters passed to do_copy_data");
01124             return FALSE;
01125       }
01126 
01127             if (pmem_void == NULL)
01128       {
01129             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid pointer passed to do_copy_data");
01130             return FALSE;
01131       }
01132             pOffsetSrc = (BYTE *)pmem_void;
01133       pOffsetSrc += uiSrcOfst;
01134       pvoid_src = (void *)pOffsetSrc;
01135       memmove(data, pvoid_src, uiSize);
01136       return TRUE;
01137 }
01138 //*****************************************************************************
01139 //
01140 // StackSize
01141 //
01142 // Parameter List : pointer to stack 
01143 //                                                           
01144 // Return Value   UINT32 stack size
01145 //                                         
01146 //                                         
01147 // Modification History :
01148 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01149 //
01150 //*****************************************************************************
01151 UINT32 StackSize(HSTACK hStack)
01152 {
01153       StackHeader *pTemp_cont;
01154       if (hStack == NULL)
01155       {
01156             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Stack pointer is NULL");
01157             return 0;
01158       }
01159       pTemp_cont = (StackHeader *)hStack;
01160       return pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01161 }
01162 //*****************************************************************************
01163 //
01164 // QueueSize
01165 //
01166 // Parameter List : pointer to queue
01167 //                                                           
01168 // Return Value   UINT32 queue size
01169 //                                         
01170 //                                         
01171 // Modification History :
01172 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01173 //
01174 //*****************************************************************************
01175 UINT32 QueueSize(HQUEUE hQueue)
01176 {
01177       QueueHeader *pTemp_cont;
01178       if (hQueue == NULL)
01179       {
01180             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Queue pointer is NULL");
01181             return 0;
01182       }
01183       pTemp_cont = (QueueHeader *)hQueue;
01184       return pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01185 }
01186 //*****************************************************************************
01187 //
01188 // ListSize
01189 //
01190 // Parameter List : pointer to queue
01191 //                                                           
01192 // Return Value   UINT32 list size
01193 //                                         
01194 //                                         
01195 // Modification History :
01196 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01197 //
01198 //*****************************************************************************
01199 UINT32 ListSize(HLIST hList)
01200 {
01201       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01202       if (hList == NULL)
01203       {
01204             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "List pointer is NULL");
01205             return 0;
01206       }
01207       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
01208       return pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01209 }
01210 //*****************************************************************************
01211 //
01212 // OrdListSize
01213 //
01214 // Parameter List : pointer to list
01215 //                                                           
01216 // Return Value   UINT32 Ordlist size
01217 //                                         
01218 //                                         
01219 // Modification History :
01220 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01221 //
01222 //*****************************************************************************
01223 UINT32 OrdListSize(HORDLIST hOrdList)
01224 {
01225       OrdListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01226       if (hOrdList == NULL)
01227       {
01228             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Ordered List pointer is NULL");
01229             return 0;
01230       }
01231       pTemp_cont = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
01232       return pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01233 }
01234 //*****************************************************************************
01235 //
01236 // AddtoList
01237 //
01238 // Parameter List : HCONTAINER - handle to list
01239 //                                                    container 
01240 //                                                    data - data to add to queue
01241 //                                                    position - position after which data is to added
01242 //                                               
01243 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if push ok
01244 //                                         else false
01245 //                                         
01246 // Modification History :
01247 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01248 //
01249 //*****************************************************************************
01250 HLIST AddtoList(HLIST hList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
01251 {
01252       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01253       UINT32 uiMax_size;
01254       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
01255       UINT32 uiTotal;
01256       UINT32 uiNew_size;
01257       UINT32 uiHead;
01258       UINT32 uiTail;
01259       void *pvoid;
01260       BYTE *pbyte;
01261       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
01262       UINT32 uiOffsetDst;
01263       UINT32 uiFinalLoc = 0;
01264       BOOLEAN fTail_check=FALSE;
01265 
01266       // check for invalid handle = 0
01267       if (hList == NULL)
01268       {
01269             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid handle to the list");
01270             return NULL;
01271       }
01272 
01273       // check for data = NULL
01274       if (pdata == NULL)
01275       {
01276             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto list is NULL");
01277             return NULL;
01278       }
01279       // check for a 0 or negative position passed in
01280       if (uiPos < 0)
01281       {
01282             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto list is NULL");
01283             return NULL;
01284       }
01285  
01286       // assign some temporary variables
01287       
01288       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
01289       if (uiPos > pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
01290       {
01291                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There are not enough elements in the list");
01292             return NULL;
01293       }
01294             uiTotal = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01295             uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01296       uiMax_size = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size;
01297       uiHead = pTemp_cont->uiHead;
01298       uiTail = pTemp_cont->uiTail;
01299       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01300       if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01301             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01302       if (uiTail == uiOffsetSrc)
01303             fTail_check = TRUE;
01304       // copy appropriate blocks
01305       if (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) && 
01306             ((uiTail > uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead == sizeof(ListHeader)))))
01307       {
01308             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01309                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01310             if (fTail_check == FALSE)
01311             {
01312                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01313                   {     
01314                          DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01315                    return NULL;
01316                   }
01317             }
01318             if (fTail_check == FALSE)
01319                         pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01320             uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01321       } 
01322 
01323 
01324             if ((((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) && (uiTail < uiHead))
01325       || (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) > uiMax_size) && (uiHead >= (sizeof(ListHeader) + uiSize_of_each)))) 
01326       {           
01327       uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01328                                      
01329             if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01330             {
01331                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01332                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01333                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetDst, uiOffsetSrc, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01334                         {     
01335                                DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01336                                return NULL;
01337                         }
01338                   uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01339             } else
01340             {
01341                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader);
01342                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01343                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01344                         {     
01345                                DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01346                                return NULL;
01347                         }
01348                         
01349                   uiOffsetSrc = uiMax_size - uiSize_of_each;
01350                   uiOffsetDst = sizeof(ListHeader);
01351                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01352                         {     
01353                                DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01354                                return NULL;
01355                         }
01356                         uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01357                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01358                         if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, (uiMax_size-uiSize_of_each) - uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01359                         {     
01360                                DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01361                                return NULL;
01362                         }
01363             }
01364                          pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01365                    uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01366       }// end if
01367                   
01368 
01369 
01370       if ((((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) && (uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead >= (sizeof(ListHeader) + uiSize_of_each)))
01371              || (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) > uiMax_size) && (uiHead == sizeof(ListHeader))))
01372       {
01373             // need to resize the container
01374             uiNew_size = uiMax_size + (uiMax_size - sizeof(ListHeader));
01375             pTemp_cont->uiMax_size = uiNew_size;
01376             if ((hList = MemRealloc(hList, uiNew_size)) == NULL)
01377             {
01378                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not resize list container memory");
01379                         return NULL;
01380                   }     
01381             pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
01382             if (do_copy(hList, sizeof(ListHeader), uiMax_size, uiHead - sizeof(ListHeader)) == FALSE)
01383             {
01384                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy list container memory");
01385                         return NULL;
01386                   }     
01387             pTemp_cont->uiTail = uiMax_size + (uiHead-sizeof(ListHeader));
01388             
01389             // now make place for the actual element 
01390 
01391                         uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01392                         uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01393                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01394                   {     
01395                          DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01396                    return NULL;
01397                   }
01398                         pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01399                   uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01400             }
01401       
01402 
01403             // finally insert data at position uiFinalLoc
01404 
01405       pbyte = (BYTE *)hList;
01406       if (uiFinalLoc == 0)
01407       {
01408                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This should never happen! report this problem!");
01409             return NULL;
01410       }
01411       pbyte += uiFinalLoc; 
01412       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
01413 
01414       memmove(pvoid, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01415             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items++;
01416       if (fTail_check == TRUE)
01417             pTemp_cont->uiTail += pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01418       return hList;
01419 }
01420 
01421 //*****************************************************************************
01422 //
01423 // RemfromList
01424 //
01425 // Parameter List : HLIST - handle to list 
01426 //                                                    container 
01427 //                                                    data - data to remove from list
01428 //                                                    position - position after which data is to added
01429 //                                               
01430 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if push ok
01431 //                                         else false
01432 //                                         
01433 // Modification History :
01434 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01435 //
01436 //*****************************************************************************
01437 BOOLEAN RemfromList(HLIST hList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
01438 {
01439       ListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01440       UINT32 uiMax_size;
01441       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
01442       UINT32 uiTotal;
01443       UINT32 uiHead;
01444       UINT32 uiTail;
01445       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
01446       UINT32 uiOffsetDst;
01447       UINT32 uiFinalLoc = 0;
01448       BOOLEAN fTail_check=FALSE;
01449 
01450       // check for invalid handle = 0
01451       if (hList == NULL)
01452       {
01453             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid handle to the list");
01454             return FALSE;
01455       }
01456 
01457       // check for data = NULL
01458       if (pdata == NULL)
01459       {
01460             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto list is NULL");
01461             return FALSE;
01462       }
01463       // check for a 0 or negative position passed in
01464       if (uiPos < 0)
01465       {
01466             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto list is NULL");
01467             return FALSE;
01468       }
01469  
01470       // assign some temporary variables
01471       pTemp_cont = (ListHeader *)hList;
01472 
01473       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
01474       {
01475             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Cannot delete at the specified position");
01476             return FALSE;
01477       }
01478       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
01479       {
01480             DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There are no elements in the list to remove");
01481             return FALSE;
01482       }
01483 
01484       uiTotal                       = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01485       uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01486       uiMax_size         = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size;
01487       uiHead                         = pTemp_cont->uiHead;
01488       uiTail                         = pTemp_cont->uiTail;
01489 
01490       // copy appropriate blocks
01491       if ((uiTail > uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead == sizeof(ListHeader))))
01492       {
01493             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01494             uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01495             if (do_copy_data(hList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01496             {
01497                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
01498                   return FALSE;
01499             }
01500             if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetDst, uiOffsetSrc, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01501             {
01502                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not remove the data the list");
01503                   return FALSE;
01504             }
01505             pTemp_cont->uiTail -= uiSize_of_each;
01506             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;
01507       }
01508 
01509 
01510       if ((uiTail < uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead <= (sizeof(ListHeader)+uiSize_of_each))))
01511       {
01512             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01513 
01514             if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01515             {
01516                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01517                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01518                   if (do_copy_data(hList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01519                   {     
01520                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
01521                         return FALSE;
01522                   }     
01523                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01524                   {     
01525                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01526                         return FALSE;
01527                   }
01528                   uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01529             }
01530             else
01531             {
01532                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(ListHeader);
01533                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01534                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01535                   {
01536                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01537                         return FALSE;
01538                   }
01539 
01540                   uiOffsetSrc = uiMax_size - uiSize_of_each;
01541                   uiOffsetDst = sizeof(ListHeader);
01542                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01543                   {
01544                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01545                         return FALSE;
01546                   }
01547                   uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01548                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01549                   if (do_copy_data(hList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01550                   {
01551                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
01552                         return FALSE;
01553                   }
01554                   if (do_copy(hList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, (uiMax_size-uiSize_of_each) - uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01555                   {
01556                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_LIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01557                         return FALSE;
01558                   }
01559             }
01560             pTemp_cont->uiTail -= uiSize_of_each;
01561             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;
01562       } // end if
01563 
01564       return TRUE;
01565 }
01566 
01567 
01568 
01569 //*****************************************************************************
01570 //
01571 // RemfromOrdList
01572 //
01573 // Parameter List : HORDLIST - handle to ordered list 
01574 //                                                    container 
01575 //                                                    data - data to remove from ordered list
01576 //                                                    position - position after which data is to added
01577 //                                               
01578 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if push ok
01579 //                                         else false
01580 //                                         
01581 // Modification History :
01582 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01583 //
01584 //*****************************************************************************
01585 BOOLEAN RemfromOrdList(HORDLIST hOrdList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
01586 {
01587       OrdListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01588       UINT32 uiMax_size;
01589       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
01590       UINT32 uiTotal;
01591       UINT32 uiHead;
01592       UINT32 uiTail;
01593       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
01594       UINT32 uiOffsetDst;
01595       UINT32 uiFinalLoc = 0;
01596       
01597 
01598       // check for invalid handle = 0
01599       if (hOrdList == NULL)
01600       {
01601             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid handle to the ordered list");
01602             return FALSE;
01603       }
01604 
01605       // check for data = NULL
01606       if (pdata == NULL)
01607       {
01608             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto ordered list is NULL");
01609             return FALSE;
01610       }
01611       // check for a 0 or negative position passed in
01612       if (uiPos < 0)
01613       {
01614             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto ordered list is NULL");
01615             return FALSE;
01616       }
01617  
01618       // assign some temporary variables
01619       
01620       pTemp_cont = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
01621       if (uiPos >= pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
01622       {
01623             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Cannot delete at the specified position");
01624             return FALSE;
01625       }
01626 
01627       if (pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items == 0)
01628       {
01629             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There are no elements in the ordered list to remove");
01630             return FALSE;
01631       }
01632 
01633       uiTotal = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01634       uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01635       uiMax_size = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size;
01636       uiHead = pTemp_cont->uiHead;
01637       uiTail = pTemp_cont->uiTail;
01638       
01639       // copy appropriate blocks
01640       if ((uiTail > uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead == sizeof(OrdListHeader))))
01641       {
01642             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01643             uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01644             if (do_copy_data(hOrdList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01645             {     
01646                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from ordered list");
01647                   return FALSE;
01648             }           
01649 
01650             if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetDst, uiOffsetSrc, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01651             {     
01652                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not remove the data from the ordered list");
01653                   return FALSE;
01654             }
01655 
01656             pTemp_cont->uiTail -= uiSize_of_each;
01657             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;  
01658       } 
01659 
01660 
01661       if ((uiTail < uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead <= (sizeof(OrdListHeader)+uiSize_of_each))))
01662       {           
01663             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01664                                      
01665             if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01666             {
01667                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01668                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01669                   if (do_copy_data(hOrdList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01670                   {     
01671                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
01672                         return FALSE;
01673                   }     
01674                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01675                   {     
01676                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01677                         return FALSE;
01678                   }
01679 
01680                   uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01681             }
01682             else
01683             {
01684                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader);
01685                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01686 
01687                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01688                   {     
01689                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01690                         return FALSE;
01691                   }
01692 
01693                   uiOffsetSrc = uiMax_size - uiSize_of_each;
01694                   uiOffsetDst = sizeof(OrdListHeader);
01695 
01696                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01697                   {     
01698                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01699                         return FALSE;
01700                   }
01701 
01702                   uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01703                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01704                   if (do_copy_data(hOrdList, pdata, uiOffsetSrc, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01705                   {     
01706                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
01707                         return FALSE;
01708                   }
01709 
01710                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, (uiMax_size-uiSize_of_each) - uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01711                   {     
01712                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01713                         return FALSE;
01714                   }
01715             }
01716 
01717             pTemp_cont->uiTail -= uiSize_of_each;
01718             pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items--;  
01719       } // end if
01720 
01721       
01722       return TRUE;
01723 }
01724 
01725 
01726 
01727 //*****************************************************************************
01728 //
01729 // StoreinOrdList
01730 //
01731 // Parameter List : HORDLIST - handle to ordered list 
01732 //                                                    container 
01733 //                                                    data - data to add to the ordered list
01734 //                                                    position - position after which data is to added
01735 //                                               
01736 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if push ok
01737 //                                         else false
01738 //                                         
01739 // Modification History :
01740 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01741 //
01742 //*****************************************************************************
01743 HORDLIST StoreinOrdList(HORDLIST hOrdList, void *pdata, UINT32 uiPos)
01744 {
01745       OrdListHeader *pTemp_cont;
01746       UINT32 uiMax_size;
01747       UINT32 uiSize_of_each;
01748       UINT32 uiTotal;
01749       UINT32 uiNew_size;
01750       UINT32 uiHead;
01751       UINT32 uiTail;
01752       void *pvoid;
01753       BYTE *pbyte;
01754       UINT32 uiOffsetSrc;
01755       UINT32 uiOffsetDst;
01756       UINT32 uiFinalLoc = 0;
01757       BOOLEAN fTail_check=FALSE;
01758 
01759 
01760       // check for invalid handle = 0
01761       if (hOrdList == NULL)
01762       {
01763             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This is not a valid handle to the ordered list");
01764             return NULL;
01765       }
01766 
01767       // check for data = NULL
01768       if (pdata == NULL)
01769       {
01770             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Data to be pushed onto ordered list is NULL");
01771             return NULL;
01772       }
01773  
01774       // assign some temporary variables
01775       pTemp_cont = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
01776 
01777       // check for invalid position
01778       if (uiPos > pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items)
01779       {
01780             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "There are not enough elements in the ordered list to add after");
01781             return NULL;
01782       }
01783 
01784 
01785       uiTotal        = pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items;
01786       uiSize_of_each = pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01787       uiMax_size     = pTemp_cont->uiMax_size;
01788       uiHead         = pTemp_cont->uiHead;
01789       uiTail         = pTemp_cont->uiTail;
01790       uiOffsetSrc    = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos * pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01791 
01792 
01793       // this shouldn't be necessary?  position should never be outside the range?
01794       if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01795             uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01796 
01797       if (uiTail == uiOffsetSrc)
01798             fTail_check = TRUE;
01799 
01800 
01801       // now copy the appropriate blocks to make room...
01802 
01803       if (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) &&
01804                   ((uiTail > uiHead) || ((uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead == sizeof(OrdListHeader)))))
01805       {
01806             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01807             uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01808 
01809             if (fTail_check == FALSE)
01810             {
01811                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01812                   {     
01813                    DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in ordered list");
01814                    return NULL;
01815                   }
01816             }
01817 
01818             if (fTail_check == FALSE)
01819                   pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01820 
01821             uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01822       } 
01823 
01824 
01825       if ((((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) && (uiTail < uiHead)) ||
01826                   (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) > uiMax_size) && (uiHead >= (sizeof(OrdListHeader) + uiSize_of_each)))) 
01827       {           
01828             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01829                                      
01830             if (uiOffsetSrc >= uiMax_size)
01831             {
01832                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader) + (uiOffsetSrc - uiMax_size);
01833                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01834 
01835                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetDst, uiOffsetSrc, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01836                   {     
01837                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01838                         return NULL;
01839                   }
01840                   uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01841             }
01842             else
01843             {
01844                   uiOffsetSrc = sizeof(OrdListHeader);
01845                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01846 
01847                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01848                   {     
01849                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01850                         return NULL;
01851                   }
01852 
01853                   uiOffsetSrc = uiMax_size - uiSize_of_each;
01854                   uiOffsetDst = sizeof(OrdListHeader);
01855 
01856                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiSize_of_each) == FALSE)
01857                   {     
01858                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01859                         return NULL;
01860                   }
01861 
01862                   uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01863                   uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + uiSize_of_each;
01864 
01865                   if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, (uiMax_size-uiSize_of_each) - uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01866                   {     
01867                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01868                         return NULL;
01869                   }
01870             }
01871 
01872             pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01873             uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01874       } // end if
01875 
01876 
01877 
01878       if ((((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) <= uiMax_size) && (uiTail == uiHead) && (uiHead >= (sizeof(OrdListHeader) + uiSize_of_each)))
01879        || (((uiTail + uiSize_of_each) > uiMax_size) && (uiHead == sizeof(OrdListHeader))))
01880       {
01881             // need to resize the container
01882             uiNew_size = uiMax_size + (uiMax_size - sizeof(OrdListHeader));
01883             pTemp_cont->uiMax_size = uiNew_size;
01884 
01885             if ((hOrdList = MemRealloc(hOrdList, uiNew_size)) == NULL)
01886             {
01887                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not resize ordered list container memory");
01888                   return NULL;
01889             }     
01890 
01891             pTemp_cont = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
01892 
01893             if (do_copy(hOrdList, sizeof(OrdListHeader), uiMax_size, uiHead - sizeof(OrdListHeader)) == FALSE)
01894             {
01895                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy ordered list container memory");
01896                   return NULL;
01897             }     
01898 
01899             pTemp_cont->uiTail = uiMax_size + (uiHead-sizeof(OrdListHeader));
01900             
01901             // now make place for the actual element 
01902 
01903             uiOffsetSrc = pTemp_cont->uiHead + (uiPos*pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01904             uiOffsetDst = uiOffsetSrc + pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01905 
01906             if (do_copy(hOrdList, uiOffsetSrc, uiOffsetDst, uiTail-uiOffsetSrc) == FALSE)
01907             {     
01908                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not store the data in list");
01909                   return NULL;
01910             }
01911             pTemp_cont->uiTail += uiSize_of_each;
01912             uiFinalLoc = uiOffsetSrc;
01913       }
01914       
01915       if (uiFinalLoc == 0)
01916       {
01917             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "This should never happen! report this problem!");
01918             return NULL;
01919       }
01920 
01921 
01922       // finally insert data at position uiFinalLoc
01923       pbyte = (BYTE *)hOrdList;
01924       pbyte += uiFinalLoc; 
01925       pvoid = (void *)pbyte;
01926       memmove(pvoid, pdata, pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem);
01927       pTemp_cont->uiTotal_items++;
01928 
01929       if (fTail_check == TRUE)
01930             pTemp_cont->uiTail += pTemp_cont->uiSiz_of_elem;
01931 
01932       return hOrdList;
01933 }
01934 
01935 
01936 
01937 //*****************************************************************************
01938 //
01939 // AddtoOrdList
01940 //
01941 // Parameter List : HORDLIST - handle to ordered list 
01942 //                                                    container 
01943 //                                                    data - data to add to the ordered list
01944 //                                               
01945 // Return Value   BOOLEAN true if Add ok else   false
01946 //                                         
01947 // Modification History :
01948 // Nov 26th 1996 -> modified for use by Wizardry
01949 // Dec 19th 1997 -> verified, cleaned up, and heavily commented by AM
01950 //
01951 //*****************************************************************************
01952 HORDLIST AddtoOrdList(HORDLIST hOrdList, void *pdata)
01953 {
01954       OrdListHeader *pOrdList;
01955       void *pTemp_data;
01956       UINT32 uiOffset;
01957       BOOLEAN fContinue = FALSE;
01958       BOOLEAN fLessThan = FALSE;
01959       BOOLEAN fMoreThan = FALSE;
01960       INT8 sbResult;
01961       UINT32 uiPosition;
01962 
01963 
01964       // get a pointer into the list header
01965       pOrdList = (OrdListHeader *)hOrdList;
01966 
01967 
01968       // if the list is empty or full)
01969       if (pOrdList->uiHead == pOrdList->uiTail) 
01970       {
01971             // if the head offset points to position 0, presumably that means it's empty (?)
01972             if (pOrdList->uiHead == sizeof(OrdListHeader))
01973             {
01974                   // so store it in position 0
01975                   if ((hOrdList = StoreinOrdList(hOrdList, pdata, 0)) == FALSE)
01976                   {
01977                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data into ordered list");
01978                         return NULL;
01979                   }
01980 
01981                   return hOrdList;
01982             }
01983 
01984             // set flag to go through the while loop even though head == tail
01985             fContinue = TRUE;
01986       }
01987 
01988 
01989       // grab enough space to store one list entry
01990       pTemp_data = MemAlloc(pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem);
01991 
01992       // start offset by pointing at the last entry in the the list
01993       uiOffset = pOrdList->uiTail;
01994 
01995       // figure out the index of the entry that the tail points to
01996       uiPosition = (pOrdList->uiTail - sizeof(OrdListHeader)) / pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem;
01997 
01998 
01999       // continue looping while offset hasn't reached the start of the list yet (or at least once if list is full)
02000       while ((uiOffset != pOrdList->uiHead) || (fContinue))
02001       {
02002             // when offset reaches the top of the list
02003             if (uiOffset == sizeof(OrdListHeader))
02004             {
02005                   // wrap around to the very bottom of the list (guaranteed to hold data?)
02006                   uiOffset = pOrdList->uiMax_size;
02007                   uiPosition = (pOrdList->uiMax_size - sizeof(OrdListHeader)) / pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem;
02008             }
02009 
02010             // get entry data at the current offset position and store it in pTemp_data
02011             if (do_copy_data(hOrdList, pTemp_data, (uiOffset - pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem), pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem ) == FALSE)
02012             {     
02013                   DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data from list");
02014                   MemFree(pTemp_data);
02015                   return NULL;
02016             }
02017 
02018             // run the compare function
02019             sbResult = pOrdList->pCompare(pTemp_data, pdata, pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem);
02020 
02021             // and do the right thing based on the result...
02022             switch (sbResult)
02023             {
02024                   case ORDLIST_ERROR : 
02025                   {           
02026                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not perform comparison for ordered lists");
02027                         MemFree(pTemp_data);
02028                         return NULL;
02029                   }
02030 
02031                   case ORDLIST_EQUAL : 
02032                   case ORDLIST_LEFT_LESS :
02033                   {
02034                         // found the right spot!  Insert it at the current position
02035                         if ((hOrdList = StoreinOrdList(hOrdList, pdata, uiPosition)) == NULL)
02036                         {     
02037                               DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data into ordered list");
02038                               MemFree(pTemp_data);
02039                               return NULL;
02040                         }
02041                         return hOrdList;
02042                   }     
02043                   
02044                   case ORDLIST_RIGHT_LESS :
02045                   {
02046                         // keep looking
02047                         uiOffset -= pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem;
02048                         uiPosition--;
02049                         break;
02050                   }
02051 
02052                   default :
02053                   {
02054                         DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Invalid result received from Compare function");
02055                         MemFree(pTemp_data);
02056                         return NULL;
02057                   }
02058             } // end switch
02059 
02060             fContinue = FALSE;
02061       } // end while
02062 
02063 
02064       // don't need this anymore
02065       MemFree(pTemp_data);
02066       pTemp_data = NULL;
02067 
02068 
02069       // never found the right spot, which means we must have reached the head (damn well better)
02070       if (uiOffset != pOrdList->uiHead)
02071       {
02072             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR - left the while loop but not at the head");
02073             return NULL;
02074       }
02075 
02076       // the new item will be first in list, so calculate the position based on the head
02077       uiPosition = (pOrdList->uiHead - sizeof(OrdListHeader)) / pOrdList->uiSiz_of_elem;
02078 
02079       // and stick it in there...
02080       if ((hOrdList = StoreinOrdList(hOrdList, pdata, uiPosition)) == FALSE)
02081       {     
02082             DbgMessage(TOPIC_ORDLIST_CONTAINERS, DBG_LEVEL_0, "Could not copy the data into ordered list");
02083             return NULL;
02084       }
02085 
02086 
02087       return hOrdList;
02088 }
02089 
02090 
02091 
02092 INT8 Compare(void *p, void *q, UINT32 size)
02093 {
02094       TEST *temp1;
02095       TEST *temp2;
02096 
02097 
02098       temp1 = (TEST *)p;
02099       temp2 = (TEST *)q;
02100 
02101       if (temp1->me < temp2->me)
02102             return ORDLIST_LEFT_LESS;
02103 
02104       if (temp1->me > temp2->me)
02105             return ORDLIST_RIGHT_LESS;
02106 
02107       if (temp1->me == temp2->me)
02108             return ORDLIST_EQUAL;
02109 
02110       return ORDLIST_ERROR;
02111 }
